contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Brunei}} [[Brunei]] is divided into four [[district]]s (''daerah''): {| class="wikitable" |{{Brunei Labelled Map}} |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#f2f2f2; font-weight:bold;" | No. || District || {{smaller|Capital}} || {{smaller|Population}}</tr> | 1. || [[Belait District|Belait]] || {{smaller|[[Kuala Belait]]}} || {{smaller|109,000}}</tr> | 2. || [[Brunei-Muara District|Brunei-Muara]]{{nbsp|2}} || {{smaller|[[Bandar Seri Begawan]]}} || {{smaller|380,000}}</tr> | 3. || [[Temburong District|Temburong]] || {{smaller|[[Bangar, Brunei|Pekan Bangar]]}} || {{smaller|10,000}}</tr> | 4. || [[Tutong District|Tutong]] || {{smaller|[[Pekan Tutong]]}} || {{smaller|56,000}}</tr> |} The districts are subdivided into [[Mukims of Brunei|thirty-eight ''mukim'']] ("provinces"). ==See also== *[[ISO 3166-2:BN]] ==References== * [http://www.statoids.com/ubn.html statoid site] <br/>{{Districts of Brunei}} {{Articles on first-level administrative divisions of Asian countries}} <!--Stubs--> <!--Categories--> [[Category:Districts of Brunei| ]] [[Category:Subdivisions of Brunei]] [[Category:Lists of country subdivisions|Brunei, Districts]] [[Category:Country subdivisions of Asia|Brunei 1]] [[Category:First-level administrative country subdivisions|Districts, Brunei]] [[Category:Brunei geography-related lists]] {{Brunei-geo-stub}}
